item.description:
Come join us at our Monthly Meet Up and make new friends or just catch up with old ones!


Hi Everybody!

Based on a suggestion from last months event we will be trying the Watch Ciy Brewery. Come join us for an evening out. Once again, remember that if you RSVP we are expecting you. If your plans change please be considerate of others and update your RSVP as soon as possible.

I will send my cell # to "YES" RSVP's so that you can let me know of any last minute cancellations or if you have difficulty finding us.
item.how_to_find_us: I will e-mail those who RSVP yes

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group
